sentences.en: An intransitive verb does not take any object.
For example, transitive verbs need an object , intransitive verbs don't.
sentences.cn: 例如, 及物动词需要受词;不及物动词则不需要.

sentences.en: In this dictionary the mark shows an intransitive verb.
sentences.cn: 在本词典中,[I] 符号表示不及物动词.

sentences.en: In this dictionary the mark shows intransitive verb.
sentences.cn: 在本词典中,符号表示不及物动词.

sentences.en: In this dictionary the mark'vi'shows an intransitive verb.
sentences.cn: 在本词典中,符号'vi'表示不及物动词.

sentences.en: Is this a transitive or an intransitive verb?
sentences.cn: 这是及物动词还是不及动词?

sentences.en: Many intransitive notional verbs plus adjectives form compound predicate sentence patterns.
sentences.cn: 许多不及物实义动词与形容词搭配,构成复合谓语句型.

sentences.en: Neither active nor passive ; intransitive . Used of verbs.
sentences.cn: 不及物动词的语法性质.

sentences.en: Next, we will say something about transitive verb and intransitive verb.
sentences.cn: 下面, 我们讲讲及物动词和不及物动词.

sentences.en: Note the difference between the intransitive verb lie, meaning'be in a resting position'
sentences.cn: 注意不及物动词lie意为 ‘ 处于休息的位置 ’

sentences.en: The noun is followed by an intransitive verb.
sentences.cn: 这个名词后接不及物动词.

sentences.en: The verbs were subdivided into transitive and intransitive categories.
sentences.cn: 动词被再分为及物动词和不及物动词.

sentences.en: Verbs that do not take object are called intransitive verbs.
sentences.cn: 不带宾语的动词称为不及物动词.

sentences.en: Verbs that do not take object intransitive verbs.
sentences.cn: 动词按能不能带宾语分为及物动词和不及物动词.

trans.tran_en: an intransitive verb has a subject but no object. For example, in the sentence ‘They arrived’, ‘arrived’ is intransitive. Intransitive verbs are marked [I] in this dictionary.
